name: Pan-Fried Tilapia Fillets with Capers
author: nt_bella
summary: If you're looking for a quick and easy way to prepare tilapia fillets in a pan. The fillets are quickly pan-fried and then cooked in a cream sauce with capers.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
¼ cup all-purpose flour, or as needed
1 (4 ounce) jar capers, drained and rinsed
directions: Season tilapia fillets with salt and pepper on all sides
Dredge in flour and shake off excess
Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat and pan-fry tilapia until golden brown, about 3 minutes per side
While tilapia is cooking, bring cream to a boil in a second skillet and season with salt and nutmeg
Simmer until cream thickens, about 5 minutes
